Hello, world

I am a researcher and artist. I aim to support health communication online. I do that through research, teaching, and art. Here are some highlights:

  • A study of public health agencies using Twitter, from 2012 through 2022.
  • Digital Safety Kit for Public Health: A guide to decrease the harm of online harassment.
  • UNFUNDABLE: A board game about academic public health.

Follow me

For usable research insights, subscribe to my Health Literacy Right Now newsletter on LinkedIn. To get the latest updates on current events, follow the Public Health Feed on BlueSky. To join a blooming community of scientists on social media, use the Public Health BlueSky Starter Pack

Site Info

I built this site with Eleventy v3.0.0. I last updated it on: Feb 11, 2025.

This site uses session storage to save your dark mode and font size choices. This means your browser stores those choices until the tab closes. I don't use Google Analytics or any other trackers. But I embed YouTube videos. I'm de-Googling this site's videos. But it'll take a while.

I use Mozilla accessibility and Web AIM resources to make this site more accessible.
